ValidationRule.description: Q4 = DM Scheduled Callback or SMB OTM Lead-Sub Disposition = DM Reached - Appointment Set either field would trigger the following two fields must be populated given the validation rule. Those fields are Follow Up Appt Date & Follow Up Appt Time
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( (OR(
ISPICKVAL( Q4_Outcome_with_DM__c , "DM Scheduled Callback"), ISPICKVAL( Q5_Outcome_with_non_DM__c , "GK Scheduled Call Back"), ISPICKVAL( SMB_OTM_Lead_Sub_Disposition__c , "DM Reached - Appointment Set"))),
(AND( ISBLANK(Follow_Up_Appt_Date__c), ISBLANK(Follow_Up_Appt_Time__c) ))
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Must insert value in Follow Up Appt Date & Follow Up Appt Time
